resources:
// App Quit Smoking OK Cancel Used permission Access Storage Permission:
• Diary: backup and restore to/from sd-card.
• Goal: load and save images for your personal goal.

Grant permissions later:
If you don\'t permit this now, you can do it later. Please open then \"Settings -> App info\" and choose \"Permissions\". //Share Great news: I stopped smoking since and I saved: cigarettes and of time. I stopped smoking // Menu Settings Share Health Overview Diary Goal Save // Main Activity Configure in settings 0.0 € $ £ ¥ days hours minutes Stopped smoking at: Not smoked since: Saved: h // Health Activity Congratulations - you did it! Reached in: Blood pressure Blood pressure, body temperature and heart rate return to normal. (20 minutes) Carbon monoxide The smoker breath disappears. The poisonous gas carbon monoxide blocks for a smoker about 10% of the red blood cells. These cells are now available again for oxygen. (8 hours) Heart attack The risk of sudden cardiac death decreases. (1 day) Sense of smell The sense of smell and the taste buds becoming more sensitive; smelling and taste is refined. (2 days) Breathing Breathing becomes easier. (3 days) Nicotine withdrawal The physical nicotine withdrawal is made. (1 week) Capacity The entire blood circulation improves. The increased lung capacity by up to 30 \%, they can absorb more oxygen again. This increases the physical Performance. (3 months) Lung hairs By now, the fine hairs are regrow in the lungs, the smokers cough disappears. Exhaustion and shortness of breath improve progressively. (9 months) Coronary arteries The risk of diseases of the coronary vessels is reduced by half. (1 year) Heart attack The risk of heart attack drops significantly. (2 years) Stroke The risk of having a stroke or a lung cancer die, is substantially lower than earlier. Also the risk of cancers of the mouth is reduced. (5 years) Lung cancer The lung cancer risk is as high as a Non smoking. The lung has almost fully recovered, pre-cancerous cells are replaced by healthy cells. (10 years) Heart attack The risk of heart attack is barely higher than in a Non smoking. (15 years) // Diary Backup diary Restore diary Delete diary // Notes Entry will be removed. OK? Delete entry Edit entry Share entry Share with: Title Content No supported file extension Please install an app to perform action. Attachment Neutral Happy Sad Smiling Cool Dead Excited Tongue Devil Backup successfully. Restore successfully. Backup failed. Restore failed. Entry not saved. Cancel editing? Paste actual date Paste actual time Paste line Sort entries Sort by title Sort by emoticon Sort by date // Camera Failed to take picture Picture saved //File chooser Choose attachment File manager // Goal Cancel Picture Choose image Rotate image Delete image Costs: Already saved: Remaining: // Settings Tabs Statistics Goal tab App Next goal Overview tab Health tab Goal tab Diary tab If you reached your current goal, you can set here a start date for your next goal. This is necessary to calculate the new time when you reach the next goal, while keeping the right statistics from the overview tab. Do you want to use the overview tab? In this tab the main statistics are presented: the time of quitting, saved cigarettes, saved money and so on. Do you want to use the health tab? In this tab the progress of your health benefits are presented: risk oh heart attack, cancer and so on. Do you want to use the goal tab? Here you can set a personal goal. Something you want to use the saved money for. Do you want to use the diary tab? Here you can write a diary with your thoughts, problems and something like this. Perhaps it will help you. Personal goal For what will you use the saved money? Please enter title and the costs of your personal goal. Name of your goal Costs (integer number): 199 Costs Costs of a single cigarette. This is used to calculate the saved money since quitting. What costs one cigarette? Currency Set your preferred currency Smoke habits Enter the number of smoked cigarettes per day und the time it took to smoke one cigarette. Number of cigarettes Time in hours (e.g. 0,2) Time When did you stop smoking? Please enter date and time. Date (preferred date format) Time (24h format: 22:22) Date format Set your preferred date format. Use it always, when you enter a date. App info Open via the system settings the app info of the app. There you can, depending on your Android version, manage several things (Storage, network traffic, permissions, …). Title already exists. Can not save entry. Can\'t open Directory. No files in directory. All entries will be deleted. Search Search in titles Search in content Search in dates Today Yesterday Day before yesterday This month Own search Cancel search title date emoticon //Intro Quit Smoking Thanks for choosing \"Quit Smoking\". It\'s open source and complete free (as in freedom). Features \"Quit Smoking\" presents you an overview with some statistics and your health benefits. Additionally you can configure a goal (What will you do with the saved money?) and write a diary. Settings Please configure some informations about your smoking habits in the settings screen. You can also configure some basic settings (date format, currency, …). Now, let\'s start … // About About … and other things Changelog, help, license, used libraries and more. Developer Used resources Contributors Japanese translation Changelog Open Github site and see what\'s new … (needs internet connection) License The app is licensed under GPL and completely open source and free (as in freedom). Gaukler Faun Open my profile on Github (needs internet connection). Intro Show the intro screen one more time. Donate If you like the app, you can donate to me via Paypal (needs internet connection). Used to build the intro screen. Used to create the \"About screen\". The source of nearly all icons. A powerful image downloading and caching library for Android. //License Dialog Copyright © 2016 by Gaukler Faun For more informations visit the project site on Github:
https://github.com/scoute-dich/QuitSmoking
